short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces your new tabs with a distraction free nepali date.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension made entirely for helping Nepalese across the globe by showing the nepali date right on their browser's new tab.

Features:

- Minimal, clean & distraction-free nepali date in native and english locale.
- Distraction free wallpaper and content to let you stay focused
- Nepali miti provided along with the extension icon
- Various settings to customize your preferences
